testcase.name: creating a new TasksController should have a $addTaskForm property that holds a selected element with the id '#add_task'
creating a new TasksController should have a $taskDescriptionInput property that holds a selected element with the id '#task_description'
creating a new TasksController should have a $selectListMenu property that holds a selected element with the id '#select_list'
creating a new TasksController should have a $taskPriorityInput property that holds a selected element with the id '#task_priority'
creating a new TasksController should have a $wrapper property that holds a selected element with the id '#wrapper'
#init (note you can always use #init as a delegator...) creating a new task via a listener on the new tasks form should create a new task
#init (note you can always use #init as a delegator...) creating a new task via a listener on the new tasks form should add a task to the correct list
#init (note you can always use #init as a delegator...) creating a new task via a listener on the new tasks form Deleting tasks (using a live event listener) should delete only that one task

#init (note you can always use #init as a delegator...) creating a new task via a listener on the new tasks form Deleting tasks (using a live event listener) should remove the task from its list.tasks property and replace it with null
